zh.title:
> search("你是专业的数字货币交易分析师。请对 雪崩币/美元(AVAX/USD) 进行技术分析。

当前市场数据：
- 最新价格: 11.6295
- 24小时变化: -0.39%
- 高点/低点: 11.6981 / 11.5842
- RSI(14): N/A
- MACD: -0.083992977, Signal: N/A
- SMA(20): 11.93484

要求：
1. 第一行：完整的中文标题，格式："雪崩币/美元技术分析：[趋势描述]"
2. 然后空一行
3. 正文3-4段，每段60-80字，总共250-300字
4. 包含：趋势判断、技术指标解读、支撑/阻力位、交易建议
5. 使用专业术语但易于理解
6. 不要添加任何标签或额外说明

立即开始（第一行就是标题）：")
zh.content:
雪崩币/美元技术分析：近期承压弱势震荡

目前AVAX价格在$11.63附近弱势震荡，短期趋势偏**下行整理**，因今日高低幅度有限且价格处在20日均线下方，表明空头略占优势，未见明确反转信号。价格持续低于SMA(20)反映多头力度不足，短线偏向观望。

技术指标方面，MACD为负值显示动能偏弱，未见底背离企稳；RSI缺失但从外部数据可参考相邻弱势读数，暗示**中性偏弱震荡**格局，未显示极端超卖marketcap.com/cmc-ai/avalanche/price-analysis/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *coinmarketcap.com* · 2026/1/22

> Key indicators like the RSI at 38.25 show bearish momentum without being oversold, while the price trading below all major moving averages (7-day SMA at $12.81, 30-day SMA at $13.31) reinforces the downtrend. Until AVAX can close above $13.80–$14.74, the path of least resistance remains down, with the next major support near $11.88.

技术指标方面，MACD为负值显示动能偏弱，未见底背离企稳；RSI缺失但从外部数据可参考相邻弱势读数，暗示**中性偏弱震荡**格局，未显示极端超卖。若未来RSI重返50以上且MACD向上交叉，可视为潜在多头信号。

支atest Avalanche (AVAX) Price Analysis - CoinMarketCap](https://coinmarketcap.com/cmc-ai/avalanche/price-analysis/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *CoinMarketCap* · 2026/1/22

> Key indicators like the RSI at 38.25 show bearish momentum without being oversold, while the price trading below all major moving averages (7-day SMA at $12.81, 30-day SMA at $13.31) reinforces the downtrend. Until AVAX can close above $13.80–$14.74, the path of least resistance remains down, with the next major support near $11.88.

支撑位上，当前接近$11.59居关键短线支撑，该水平历史上多次作为区间底部反弹区域；若失守此位，下一支撑或在$10.2附近。阻力位在$12.5–$13区间，突破清关将释放较强反弹动量，进一步阻力在中期盘整区高点附近。

交易建议上，建议短线交易者在支撑附近谨慎布局止损，待价格企稳并伴随成交量放大确认反弹时再加仓；若价格有效站上$ 的相关性。](https://www.gate.com/zh/crypto-wiki/article/what-is-avalanche-avax-price-volatility-analysis-support-resistance-levels-and-btc-eth-correlation-in-2025-20251219?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *Gate.com* · 2025/12/19

> 本文分析了Avalanche（AVAX）在2025年12月期间的价格波动，以及其与BTC和ETH的相关性。文章指出，$11.59至$13.21的当前交易区间构成关键支撑与阻力位，并强调突破这些区间对于市场的重要意义。分析还探讨了AVAX近期表现下滑，以及其与主流加密货币之间的高度相关性，反映出市场整体情绪和宏观经济 ...

交易建议上，建议短线交易者在支撑附近谨慎布局止损，待价格企稳并伴随成交量放大确认反弹时再加仓；若价格有效站上$13并守稳，可考虑顺势跟多，中线持仓者则宜控制仓位，等待更明确趋势变化信号。

> **[Latest Avalanche (AVAX) Price Analysis - CoinMarketCap](https://coinmarketcap.com/cmc-ai/avalanche/price-analysis/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *CoinMarketCap* · 2026/1/22

Until AVAX can close above $13.80–$14.74, the path of least resistance remains down, with the next major support near $11.88.

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar is showing a slight bearish tone as we analyze its current market position. The price of $11.6295 represents a minor 0.39% drop in the past 24 hours, indicating subdued volatility in the near term. The lack of significant upward momentum suggests that buyers are hesitant to push above recent highs, while the lower end of the range at $11.5842 provides a short-term support level. A move below this level could trigger further downside potential, potentially targeting $11.50 or lower.

The 20-period Simple Moving Average (SMA) is positioned at $11.9348, above the current price, acting as a potential resistance point. This level has been tested recently, but the failure to break above it suggests a lack of buying strength. A break and close above the SMA could signal a shift in sentiment, potentially opening up room for a retest of the $12.00 mark. However, if AVAX fails to regain ground near the SMA, sellers may dominate, pushing prices back toward the lower support range.

Given the current MACD value of -0.0839, there is a mild bearish divergence that signals the possibility of further downside. The absence of the RSI complicates the interpretation, but combined with the negative MACD reading, it reinforces the cautious sentiment in the market. The lack of momentum indicators makes it harder to call for a reversal in the short term. If the MACD crosses back toward the zero line, it could suggest potential buying opportunities, though confirmation from additional indicators would be needed.

In terms of trading strategy, traders should closely monitor the $11.58 support zone. A breakout below this level could provide an opportunity for short positions with a target near $11.50. Conversely, a rally above $11.94, coupled with a reversal in the MACD, could indicate a buying opportunity, with $12.00 as the first major resistance target.
